ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE GATHERING STORM”
The countdown to SAVAGE DRAGON #250 continues!
Malcolm Dragon’s greatest foes assemble in an attempt to eliminate him once and for all! A great jumping-on point for new readers from award-winning writer/artist ERIK LARSEN.
*Contents* The Gathering Storm! G-Man Webcomics Funnies: Ear More Bikes Funnies: Draw Brandon Draw Funnies: Berkeley Mews
ComicInfo.Title: G-Man Webcomics; The Gathering Storm!
ComicInfo.Writer: Ben Zaehringer,Brandon B.,Chris Giarrusso,Erik Larsen,Nate Bulmer,Nathan Bulmer,Ben Zaehringer,Nathan Bulmer,Chris Giarrusso,Erik Larsen
